message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, considering it's worth a lot more to me. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and meet at $11,000? I'm still willing to negotiate further, but I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,200? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget

Bob, I appreciate you trying to work with me. $10,200 is still a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to make one last compromise. How about $10,800?  This is really as low as I can go, but I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.

I understand that you're willing to compromise, but $10,800 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,200 and $10,800. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $10,500?

Bob, I appreciate your efforts to meet me halfway, but $10,500 is still a bit too low. I'm willing to go down to $10,700, which is a fair compromise considering the value of the product. If you're still interested, let me know, but if not, I'll have to move on to another buyer.
I understand that you're willing to compromise, but $10,700 is still above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,400, but that's as high as I can go. Please let me know if that's acceptable to you
